conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion checks passed successfully.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have significant height and thickness. Floors are distinct planes. Excellent perception of interior volume and correct 3D corner geometry. Viewing angle is clearly isometric/angled, providing an elevated perspective. Minimal perspective distortion. Roof/ceiling is cleanly removed, exposing all interior spaces without broken geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: All rooms from the 2D plan are present, with correct adjacency and preserved relative proportions. Major wall positions align very well. Wall lengths appear proportional. Internal partitions are accurately placed. Doors are generally present and on correct walls, though some minor discrepancies exist (e.g., small wall section missing near an exterior door in the 3D model). Windows are present and on correct walls, and their openings are proportionally sized and oriented.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture (beds, sofas, tables) is present and accurately corresponds to the 2D plan. Kitchen elements and bathroom fixtures are also present. Furniture is correctly placed within rooms, and its scale is reasonable relative to the room size. The orientation of furniture is logical and matches the 2D plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable. The geometry is very readable and not visually confusing. Interior is well-lit and clearly visible, with lighting not obscuring any geometry. Material usage is consistent. No major rendering artifacts or broken meshes. The background is clean and aids presentation, although the grid pattern is very subtle, it does not detract.

detected_errors.description: A very small section of the exterior wall next to an entrance door appears to be missing or slightly misaligned in the 3D model compared to the 2D plan.

summary: The 3D transformation is an excellent and geometrically faithful conversion of the 2D floor plan, maintaining high accuracy in layout and interior elements.
